data.title: Pierre Mocky Photos, News and Videos, Trivia and Quotes
data.meta_description: 20 August 2024... FamousFix profile for Jean-Pierre Mocky including biography information, wikipedia facts, photos, galleries, news, youtube videos, quotes, posters, magazine covers, trailers, links, filmography, discography and trivia.
data.text:
Jean-Pierre Mocky Director - Born July 6, 1929 in Nice, Alpes-Maritimes, France

Died August 8, 2019 in Paris, France (renal failure)

Birth Name Jean-Paul Adam Mokiejewski

Height 5' 9¼" (1.76 m)

Mini Bio (1) As an actor he became popular as Albert de Morcerf in a version of The Count of Monte Cristo (1954), fame and adulation followed with his Francois in Head Against the Wall (1959). As a director he became famous with anarcho-pictures, brilliant cynic comedies. His preferred actors in all decades were Michel Serrault and Jean Poiret - till the late 80's they were his leading stars. When Jeanne Moreau appeared in Le miraculé (1987), many other leading French screen-stars followed.

- IMDb Mini Biography By: Bio

Spouse (3)

edit

Maryse Bideaux (30 April 1975 - 9 May 1983) divorced

Véronique Nordey (6 March 1967 - 25 November 1972) divorced 1 child M1. Stanislas Nordey

Monique Bodin (14 August 1947 - 29 June 1964) divorced 1 child

Relationship

edit

Patricia Barzyk 1999 to 2012

Trivia (7)

edit

Has his own movie theater "Le Brady" in Paris He sold it in 2011 to buy the multiplex 'Action Écoles which he renamed Le Desperado.

Father of Stanislas Nordey with Véronique Nordey and of Olivia Mokiejewski.

His official birth year is 1933 but was actually born in 1929. After the 1919 Revolution, Jean-Pierry and his family left Ukraine to live in the French Riviera. In 1940, because of the Jews persecutions, he wants to send Jean-Pierre in Algeria. But the boy is too young to travel alone. His father lies about his age, saying he was born 1933.

Officially firstly married at 17 years-old but was actually 13.

He lived with ex Miss France 1980 Patricia Barzyk (I) from 1999 to 2012.

Was married 4 times.

Father of 17 children. Claimed he was 12 when his first child was born.
